sense.def: Abbreviated Designation ye 噎 ; Alternative Names ye ji 噎疾 , gullet occlusion ailment; ye sai 噎塞 , gullet occlusion. Pathological Condition of a ye ge 噎膈 , gullet occlusion, where the seat of the disease is in the throat and does not permit beverages or food to pass. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 26: 羊肚共飯飲常 食，久之成反胃，作噎病 , “If one regularly consumes sheep stomach together with one’s food and beverages, after an extended period this will cause a turnedover stomach and result in gullet occlusion disease ”.
